channel.title: ::commands command
channel.description: hi guys ive downloaded a 317 source wich is realy good but it dosent have ::commands command anyone know how to add it??

item.title: ::commands command
item.dc:creator: @Christiaan Christiaan
item.description:
@Christiaan wrote:

i prefer:

	   if(command.startsWith("commands") && playerRights >= 0)
     {
        clearQuestInterface();
        sendQuest("Close Window", 8135);//Close Text 
        sendQuest("@dre@Commands ", 8144);//Title 
        sendQuest("These are the commands you can use:", 8145);
        sendQuest("::commands, opens this screen  :D", 8147); 
        sendQuest("  more commands   ", 8148); 
        sendQuest("     and more    ", 8149); 
        sendQuest("", 8150); 
        sendQuest("", 8151); 
        sendQuest("", 8152); 
        sendQuest("", 8153); 
        sendQuest("", 8154); 
        sendQuest("", 8155); 
     	flushOutStream();
     
     }

Read full topic

item.title: ::commands command
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands")) { sM("commands..."); sM("commands..."); sM("commands..."); sM("commands..."); }

Or you could use some sort of interface, but the above is easier.
